sentences.english: Lipid layer of cuticle is a hydrophobic surface on which the anti felting resin can't deposit well.
sentences.chinese: 羊毛表面類脂結構的存在不利於防氈縮樹脂的吸附。

sentences.english: The snail drew in its horns.
The frightened children were clustered together.
sentences.chinese: 受驚嚇的小孩子們縮在一塊。

sentences.english: If you sleep curled up, you are probably a very nervous person.
sentences.chinese: 如果你縮蜷身體而睡，則你很可能是個易緊張之人。

sentences.english: She recoiled at the sight of the snake.

sentences.english: Just permit the dime that she so shrinks in the carriage, allow her to so wail.
sentences.chinese: 只是任她那麼縮在馬車的一角，任她那麼哭着。

sentences.english: Zoom out and space and time play equal parts, in line with Lorentz symmetry.
sentences.chinese: 縮小時空間和時間平分秋色，與洛倫茲對稱相一致。

sentences.english: There was no depression of uterine activity during infusion period and second stage of labor.
sentences.chinese: 此後在連續輸注及第二產程中無宮縮抑制現象。

sentences.english: Outside the wind was so I put my whole body shrinks up, teeth, but keep tremble.
sentences.chinese: 外面的風吹得我把全身縮了起來，牙齒卻不停打顫。

sentences.english: The thumbnail will be scaled to a rectangle as large as possible inside a given rectangle, preserving the aspect ratio.
sentences.chinese: 縮圖會依照原有的比例，儘可能縮放到指定的矩形中。

sentences.english: She clasped and unclasped her hands.
sentences.chinese: 她鬆開手，身子縮了回去。

sentences.english: She stared down at me and backed up, concerned but afraid.
sentences.chinese: 她向下凝視着我和蝟縮，擔心，但害怕。

sentences.english: The tank laboriously crawled on with a huddle of soldiers hanging behind.
sentences.chinese: 坦克喫力地爬行着，一堆士兵縮在後面跟着走。
